title: Return journey: a tribute to Burke and Wills
creator_credit: Albatross Film Pty Ltd, John Sherman and William Sterling
brief_description: Re-enacts the 1861 expedition of Burke and Wills, with emphasis on the return journey north across the continent of Australia. Relates the rigours and heartbreaks of the expedition, culminating in the deaths of the explorers at Cooper Creek.
